module.name: Voicemail
module.changelog: *16.0.48* FREEI-5549 vm backup issue *16.0.47* FREEPBX-23781 *16.0.46* FREEI-4015 D series - Voicemail app on multiple AORs *16.0.45* FREEPBX-22996 Added check to validate file extension from file type *16.0.44* FREEI-4977 UCC Voicemail to email URL issue fix *16.0.43* Reverting Bootstrap and dependent libs fixes *16.0.42* Packaging of ver 16.0.42 *16.0.41* Packaging of ver 16.0.41 *16.0.40* FREEI-4793 *16.0.39* FREEPBX-20336 and FREEI-4723 *16.0.38* FREEI-4350 Added backend validation for validating file format *16.0.37* FREEI-4667 GQLAPI for voicemail is showing success response if extension is not present *16.0.36* FREEI-4431 Reduced calling multiple ajax request into one request to move or delete bulk voicemails *16.0.35* SCD-224 make the voicemail msg_id unique *16.0.34* FREEPBX-23296 and FREEI-4431 *16.0.33* FREEI-4431 Concatenated folder name and voicemail name for msg_id while getting messages by extension *16.0.32* FREEPBX-23296 GraphQL Reload Voicemail Configuration *16.0.31* FREEI-4308 UCP VM widget loosing VM after moving them *16.0.30* FREEPBX-23172 Added new field 'voicemails' to getStaticSettings function *16.0.29* FREEPBX-23065 Forward VM broken in VM UCP Widget *16.0.28* FREEI-4033 Configuring voicemail to email *16.0.27* FREEI-4033 Configuring voicemail to email *16.0.26* FREEI-4033 Configuring voicemail to email *16.0.25* FREEI-4033 Added condition to replace 'AMPWEBADDRESS' value, if it exists in advance settings *16.0.24* Packaging of ver 16.0.24 *16.0.23* FREEI-1520 External notify field not being populated automatically in Voicemail admin *16.0.22* SCD-25 method to generate symlink for a voicemail file and return a link to access it *16.0.21* FREEI-2107 patch the security issue *16.0.20* Packaging of ver 16.0.20 *16.0.19* set Default options for voicemail if Optional params are not sent *16.0.18* FREEI-3702 UCP-QA - VM, CEL widgets are missing for V165 *16.0.17* Fix `resolveInputNames` incorrect handling of variables: `saycid`, `envelope`, `attach`, and `delete` *16.0.16* FREEI-3445 add method to call from userman to update the VM widget user details *16.0.15* FREEI-3313 *16.0.14* FREEPBX-20666 UCP voice mails can't be move while UCP is in frensh *16.0.13* FREEI-3253 Restore of VM greetings is not copying it's data on restore *16.0.12* FREEPBX-22075 *16.0.11* FREEPBX-22444 bug fixed for voicemail not playing in ucp *16.0.10* Packaging of ver 16.0.10 *16.0.9* FREEI-2982 *16.0.8* Packaging of ver 16.0.8 *16.0.7* FREEI-2856 Voicemail App - Voicemail Messages not showing properly *16.0.6* FREEI-2791 added playVoicemailMessage method for dphone API *16.0.5* FREEI-2780 Added getMessagesCountByExtensionPath method for Dphone API *16.0.4* FREEI-2741 Added checkVoicemailMessagesPath method for Dphone API *16.0.3* FREEI-1542 Constant VM Notifications when logged into UCP *16.0.2* FREEI-1656 UCP throwing AJAX error *16.0.1alpha* 16.0.1 alpha release
module.description: This module allows you to configure Voicemail for a user or extension
